textBeforeTable: See also OMIM:274150 Disease descriptionA hematologic disease characterized by hemolytic anemia with fragmentation of erythrocytes, thrombocytopenia, diffuse and non-focal neurologic findings, decreased renal function and fever. recessive. The disease is caused by mutations affecting the gene represented in this entry. VARIANT TTP CYS-658. Cited for: Abstract] Europe PMC] [ PubMed] [ Ann. Clin. Lab. Sci. 41:273-276(2011) [ Kim S.R.
